description: Gets the count of network resources, by resource type, for the specified global network.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. The following are the supported resource types for Direct Connect: dxcon dx-gateway dx-vif The following are the supported resource types for Network Manager: attachment connect-peer connection core-network device link peering site The following are the supported resource types for Amazon VPC: customer-gateway transit-gateway transit-gateway-attachment transit-gateway-connect-peer transit-gateway-route-table vpn-connection.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next page of results.
